title: Zhen Dao Ge 2nd Season

synonyms: Zhen Dao Ge 2: Jiangjun Xie Yin

synopsis:
Following the clues, He Fangzhi and Aya finally found the mastermind behind the murder of Lord Lin. Afterwards, they went to Fengming Mountain, entrusted by the Pavilion Master, to rescue someone in the Northwest… Along the way, He Fangzhi encountered all sorts of people, some in high positions, others in the martial world. Each had their own choices and, in their own way, upheld what they believed in!

(Source: Tencent, translated)
